commit message: Added zipalign to the build process.
Made the ListActivity file, which was growing large, smaller by moving bits into separate files.
Moved static utilities to a separate file.

Support ability to do orientation changes. I'm normally not a fan about supporting different orientations if there is no good reason for it (like the necessity to use a keyboard), but since our app is so simple, and the orientation change is so fast, it makes sense to implement this; besides, we now also better support other configuration changes. Note though that currently, there is still a bug when changing while a component state change is ongoing.
Show a warning about uninstalling the app the first time the user disables a component.
Fixed orientation change during component state change.
